alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 7:55PM CDT until August 26 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Texas... Nueces River near Tilden affecting McMullen County. For the Nueces River...including Tilden...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nueces River near Tilden. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The flooding of livestock, roads, irrigation pumps and tank batteries occurs. Fences and hunting cabins are damaged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday, the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Nueces River Tilden 14.0 17.5 Mon 7 pm 15.1 14.2 13.7 13.4 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
